query:
SELECT u.id, u.email, u.name, u.emailVerified, e.code, e.verified, e.expiresAt, e.createdAt 
FROM users u 
LEFT JOIN email_verification_codes e ON u.id = e.userId 
WHERE u.email = 'zzkjcbg536@cmhvzylmfc.com' 
ORDER BY e.createdAt DESC 
LIMIT 1;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2jqMZP8uptaqoP6.896a312398d9 --database WDxbdCBK55YBCHv5qRB4fU --execute SELECT u.id, u.email, u.name, u.emailVerified, e.code, e.verified, e.expiresAt, e.createdAt 
FROM users u 
LEFT JOIN email_verification_codes e ON u.id = e.userId 
WHERE u.email = 'zzkjcbg536@cmhvzylmfc.com' 
ORDER BY e.createdAt DESC 
LIMIT 1;
